name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pray for GODs' guidance in a Google search

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension replaces the Google logo with a prayer in the name of Jesus, our savior. It only runs on the Google.com domain.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pray for GODs' guidance and direction in everything that you do. 
Thank GOD for everything. Glory to GOD.

All comments and feedback are welcome.
Original concept inspired by a discussion of GODs word with Bill Higgins and Don Clark.

 v1.0 - Replace Google logo png with a prayer image. Image was hosted on Google Photos, but did not seem to load for others.
 v1.1 - Changed hosted image to imgur.com
